Title: Studying the Impact of Social Structures on Software Quality
Published: Program Comprehension (ICPC), 2010 IEEE 18th International Conference on
UseOF-SZZ:
To perform a grouping of single change records using a
sliding window approach
Summary:
investigate statistical models, to study the impact of social structures between
developers and end-users on software quality.
Outcome:
results indicate that statistical models based on
social information have a similar degree of explanatory power
as traditional models
